reviews.review: Great movie, probably the best marvel movie since it's starts. Fans may dislike the ending but part two will solve that

Worst Marvel movie to date. I'm so freaking mad right now. Not a single person left that theater with a smile on their face. Not a single one. I get where they are going, and everything will get better, but for the next year, I am going to be seething, and brooding, and generally telling anyone from Marvel to "F" off.

Quite possibly my favorite MCEU movie ever. This is what I jave been waiting for since the mid-credit scene of Avengers and it was worth the wait. Keep in mind all the series and too many characters is no issue. The plot is great, action stupendous, and cgi perfect, except for one shot. Acting was good as always every character held true to their abilities. Thanos voiced by Josh Brolin is quite possibly the greatest villain of all time, aside from Darth Vader of course, his emotions and pure malice makes him something truly evil. No real flaws for me, cannot wait for the future. 4.5/5

Marvel does a fantastic job in the portrayal of Thanos as the villain. He is probably one of the best and most feared villain I have ever seen. He is not just some whimsical villain we see in almost every other movie. He truly believes that his goal is the only way for the survival of the universe. Marvel did so incredible with his character, viewers even somewhat understand his intentions and feel empathetic toward him at times.
Wonderful story .. this is different than everyone sometimes hero will lose or win
It was good, but it was all over the place.

Intense. Mind Blowing. Emotional. Epic. Next summer can't get here fast enough! Bring kleenex and a flask- maybe call your therapist the next morn. The Russo brothers are not playing around. Warning: you will hate Thanos and most of his children and wish them a torturous death. Warning: you will feel like you were punched in the gut and run over by a mack truck. You will laugh. You will cry. You will cheer. You will be left stunned and speechless. Marvel delivers!

Quick, fast, unexpected whilst overall predictable and ends where it needs to be to lead into even more MCU movies.
Well played story line!
